```py
-- Uniqueness
SELECT SNOWFLAKE.CORE.NULL_COUNT(
  SELECT customer_id
  FROM jzhang_test.product.fct_subscriptions
);
```

```py
-- Freshness
SELECT SNOWFLAKE.CORE.FRESHNESS(
  SELECT
    _loaded_at_utc
  FROM jzhang_test.product.fct_subscriptions
) < 60;
-- replace 60 with your calculated threshold value
```
